test_case = int(raw_input())
for i in range(test_case):
	size = int(raw_input())
	array = map(int, raw_input().split())
	array.sort()
	cv = []
	start = 0
	for i in range(size-1):
		if array[i] != array[i+1]:
			cv.append(array[start:i+1])
			start = i+1
		elif i == size -2:
			if array[-1] == array[-2]:
				cv.append(array[start:])
			else:
				cv.append(array[-1])
	occurence = len(cv[0])
	value = cv[0][0]
	for k in range(len(cv)):
		if len(cv[k]) > occurence:
			occurence = len(cv[k])
			value = cv[k][0]
		elif len(cv[k]) == occurence and cv[k][0] < value:
			value = cv[k][0]
	print value , occurence
